summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period of July 1, 2015, to July 31, 2015. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges associated with the account.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of July 2015 was $41,527.80.
A transfer of $100,000.00 was made into the account on July 22, 2015.
The ending balance as of July 31, 2015, was $140,842.30.
There were no overdraft fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
